dmca.title: NBC Universal, Inc. copyrighted materials
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Pedorella, Marni (NBC Universal) [mailto:Marni.Pedorella@nbcuni.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 28, 2005 10:02 AM
To: 'copyright@theplanet.com'
Cc: Romano, Jennifer (NBC Universal)
Subject: NBC Universal, Inc. copyrighted materials




June 28, 2005 

VIA EMAIL 
copyright@the <mailto:copyright@the>planet.com 
George Poletes, Designated Agent 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 
Dallas, TX 75207 

        Re: bestpricedvdsets.com 

Dear Mr. Poletes: 

I write as counsel on behalf of NBC Universal, Inc, owners of all rights to
the television series "Monk", "Profiler" and "Will & Grace".

As you may be aware, Internet service providers can be held liable if they
do not respond to claims of infringement pursuant to the requirements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
